messages.title: Why I'm supporting Ellie Reeves
messages.content: Over the last two years Ellie has been a huge support. She has stood up on the issues that matter to our local community and has helped support our local businesses and everyone else in Lewisham West & Penge. We will be voting for Ellie because of her support for local businesses, her stance on Brexit, and her tireless work in the local community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Take the investment from our Green New Deal to build new council and affordable homes and end homelessness.
Double the investment in youth mental health and violence emergency funds.
Introduce a transformative green agenda to tackle the climate emergency and create thousands of new jobs.
Protect and invest in our public services and end the Tory driven austerity.

mentions.candidate: Ellie has worked tirelessly to make sure that our voice is heard in Parliament. I was born and raised in the constituency and am now proud to be raising my own family here.
mentions.tacticalSituation: We need a Labour government to reverse the damage that Tories have done and to resolve the Brexit crisis by giving the public the final say.

issues.brexitEurope: We need a Labour government to reverse the damage that the Tories have done and to resolve the Brexit crisis by giving the public the final say.
issues.environment: Introduce a transformative green agenda to tackle the climate emergency.

community.content: Ellie has helped support our local businesses and everyone else in Lewisham West & Penge.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born and raised in the constituency and am now proud to be raising my own family here. I have dealt with thousands of constituents' cases, working tirelessly to make sure our voice is heard in Parliament.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked tirelessly to make sure our voice is heard in Parliament and dealt with thousands of constituents' cases.
